languages.text: "Трон побери, почему с ксеносами всегда так сложно!"

traits.locale_text: "Трон побери, почему с ксеносами всегда так сложно!"

languages.text: "For Throne's sake, why do xenos have to be so difficult?"
languages.original_text: "Трон побери, почему с ксеносами всегда так сложно!"

traits.locale_text: "For Throne's sake, why do xenos have to be so difficult?"
"For Throne's sake, why do xenos have to be so difficult?"
"For Throne's sake, why do xenos have to be so difficult?"
"For Throne's sake, why do xenos have to be so difficult?"
"For Throne's sake, why do xenos have to be so difficult?"

languages.text: «Por el amor del Trono, ¿por qué son tan fastidiosos los xenos?».
languages.original_text: "For Throne's sake, why do xenos have to be so difficult?"

traits.locale_text: «Por el amor del Trono, ¿por qué son tan fastidiosos los xenos?».

languages.text: 「王座のために、なぜ異種族がそこまで意地を張るんだ？」
languages.original_text: "For Throne's sake, why do xenos have to be so difficult?"

traits.locale_text: 「王座のために、なぜ異種族がそこまで意地を張るんだ？」

languages.text: “黄金王座在上，为什么异形总是那么不可理喻？”
languages.original_text: "For Throne's sake, why do xenos have to be so difficult?"

traits.locale_text: “黄金王座在上，为什么异形总是那么不可理喻？”

languages.text: « Pour l'amour du Trône, pourquoi les xénos sont-ils toujours si difficiles ? »
languages.original_text: "For Throne's sake, why do xenos have to be so difficult?"

traits.locale_text: « Pour l'amour du Trône, pourquoi les xénos sont-ils toujours si difficiles ? »

languages.text: "Beim Thron, warum müssen Xenos so kompliziert sein?"
languages.original_text: "For Throne's sake, why do xenos have to be so difficult?"

traits.locale_text: "Beim Thron, warum müssen Xenos so kompliziert sein?"

languages.text: "Taht aşkına, zenolar neden sürekli zorluk çıkarıyor?"
languages.original_text: "For Throne's sake, why do xenos have to be so difficult?"

traits.locale_text: "Taht aşkına, zenolar neden böyle zorluk çıkarırlar?"
